text:
@realDonaldTrump A small leak can sink a big ship. Everything east and west of Ogalalla, NE is a developing hot spot. That includes Mar-a-Go-Go and every block of DC surrounding the White House. You are trapped!
https://t.co/UaRNZ5PmOB
